14521.title: Naruto

145212.content: Girls of the leaf village
145212.title: Girls

1452121.content: Who's she having tickle fun with?
1452121.title: Sakura

145212111.content:
Sakura and ino were hanging out at the training field when a random childish idea popped into ino's head. They decided to test out who was the more ticklish of the two. "So what are the rules?" Sakura asked. "We tickle each others weak spots while the other does nothing to fight back and we see who can take it longer." Ino explained.

Sakura's weak spots-Feet, ribs, armpits

Ino's weak spots-Feet,Sides, Belly

Who's going first?
145212111.title: Who's more ticklish contest

1452121111.content: "You first billboard-brow" ino said out of spite. Sakura glared at her before sitting back on her hands and put her feet in ino's lap. Ino gained an evil grin." I have the advantage sakura. All those sleepovers we had helped me learn all your weak spots. The balls of your feet and between your toes get you howling like a wolf. This contest is as good as over." Ino thought. Starting a timer she brought along, she scribbled her fingers along the middle of her feet. *Snort* haahahahahahahahhahahahahaha thahahahat ihihihihit hahahahaha Sakura threw her head back laughing loudly. Her arches weren't the worst but they got her laughing quickly. Ino made good use of her nails to scratch at sakura's soles, making the pink haired shinobi laugh like a little girl. Minutes later and sakura was starting to tear up from laughing so much. Her hands were curled into tight fists as she tried not to pull away. Ino on the other hand decided to end this. On one foot she scratched the ball of her foot and on the other she sawed her fingers in between her toes. "PFFTHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHA NOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA Sakura finally couldn't handle it and pulled away with a shriek. Ino looked at the timer and saw that she had lasted 7 minutes. "This might be tougher then I thought."Ino thought growing slightly nervous.
1452121111.title: Contest Part 1 Sakura's feet challenge

14521211111.content:
"Your turn ino-pig" Sakura said after catch her breath. Ino stuck her tongue out in defiance and stuck her feet in sakura's lap. "This might be tough. I don't know ino's weak spot on her feet." Sakura thought nervous. Ino smirked. "As long as she avoids the top of my feet, this round is as good as mine." Ino though cocky. Sakura started the timer and got to work.

While she didn't have nails like ino she still made good with what she had. She was still grateful that she still got ino laughing but no nearly as hard as she was. hahahahahahahahahahahaha-pfft-hehehehehehehe thihihihis is nohohohthing hahahahahahahahaha Sakura started getting desperate. Even using ino's tactics and sawing in between her toes. While ino's laughter grew, she wasn't pulling away. Hahahahahahahaha nohohoot bahahahad hahahahahahahahaha Sakura was strting to grow irritated and scribbled her fingers all over. It wasn't until ino let out an uncontrollable shriek that sakura stopped in her tracks and was starting to figure something out.

Sakura noticed she didn't until she tickled..."Don't tell me" sakura though and she lightly scratched the top of ino's foot getting another squeal. Ino's cocky demeanor went away and sakura grew an evil smirk. "Gotcha". Sakura then went to town on her new target and ino well...HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH NOHOHOHOHOT NOHOHOHOT THEHEHEHEHEHEHERE Ino was going crazy and sakura had barely started. As much as she tried to resist, she couldn't take it and she pulled away shrieking with laughter. She had lasted 6 minutes. Just a minute shy of sakura's time.

"Round one goes to me ino-pig" Sakura said, grinning impishly.
14521211111.title: Contest Part 2 Ino feet challenge

145212111111.content:
Sakura leaned back on her hands, leaving her upper body open. Sakura had a cocky smirk from the beginning. "You already lost this round pig". Sakura thought. They both knew they were pretty ticklish but both of them had one spot they loved having tickled. For sakura it was her ribs but she made sure ino didn't know that. She was broken out of her thoughts as ino got to work trying to win this round. *snort*hahahahahahahahahaha-*snort*hahahahahahaha quit poking mehehehe your mahahahking me snort hahahahahahahahaha Ino snickered to herself as she kept up the torture. Sakura couldn't stop laughing. She could feel ino's fingers playing her ribs like a piano.

The pink hired shinobi was cackling up a storm and unbeknownst to ino, she was loving every second. Nearly 5 minutes later, sakura was crying with laughter. Meanwhile ino's frustration was starting to get to her as she increased the pressure on her hysterical friend. She noticed that she had barely said anything and and wasn't squirming at all. She was trying to figure out why but nothing was clicking. Three more minutes passed and sakura finally covered herself giggling hysterically. "Oh man. That was fun. hehe beat that ino-pig" sakura thought to herself as she tried to catch her breath.
145212111111.title: Contest part 3 Sakura rib tickling

1452121111111.content:
Ino assumed the same position as sakura did earlier with a small scowl. "This is gonna tickle a lot. But I have no choice. I can't give up here." Ino thought determined. Sakura then started the timer and went to town on ino's sides. The blond girl snorted before she started laughing loudly. Hahahahahahahaahaha *snort* hahahahahahaha*snort* *snort* ahahahahahahahahahaha Sakura giggled to herself.

"Now I have another reason to call you ino-pig. You snort like one too." Skaura said, highly amused. Hahahahaha shu-hahahahahah shut up hahahahahahahahaha *Snort* hahahahahahahahaha Ino didn't know why she would snort when someone tickled her sides but she never liked it. Especially now that sakura knew. Ino's clenched the ground beneath her but refused to give in. "Only 5 minutes until I beat her time". She thought. Easier said then done. Her laughter was growing louder every second but she still kept herself from moving. Minutes passed slowly but she endured and finally the timer went off. She beat sakura's time by at least a minute. Now for sakura's final round
1452121111111.title: Ino's side splitting laughter

14521211111111.content:
Sakura lied on her back and tucked her hands behind her head. She mentally braced herself as while she kinda liked being tickled on her armpits, they were her worst spot. Ino started the timer and got to work. Sakura was instantly in hysterics as her worst spot was tortured. She kicked her feet out, squirming in ino's grasp laughing hysterically. Ino snorted to herself as she drove her friend to tears. Despite her melting mind, sakura was kinda enjoying herself but was still trying to win this. Sadly ino knew that her armpits were her weakness and simply increased the pressure.

Sakura screamed and clamped her arms trying to protect herself, now screaming with laughter. Ino then stopped the timer unable to keep herself from laughing. Two hahahaa 2 minutes bill-board brow hahaha

Sakura pouted as she lost the round that easily. She was so going down for this.

Ino was up next for the final round
14521211111111.title: Sakura armpit tickle torture

145221.content:
"So what is it we're doing?" A now 16 year old Sakura Haruno asked her old friend and love rival Ino Yamanaka. "Basically Lady Tsunade asked me to test your endurance." Ino said. Sakura had a sweatdrop. "But why...tickling of all things?" Sakura asked weirded out that lady tsunade of all people ordered. "I don't know but I wasn't about to question it. I already went through it so know it's your turn." Ino said. Sakura sighed in acceptance and raised her arms. Ino made a hand sign and ropes suddenly appeared from out of nowhere, bounding her arms up toward the ceiling.

"So how long am I taking this?" Sakura asked slightly nervous. As much as she liked being tickled, this was for a test so her usual excitement was replaced by nervousness. "As long as the others. Me and tenten lasted about 20 minutes. Surprisingly, Hinata lasted nearly 40. Never knew she could laugh that loudly." Ino said, briefly flashing back to a hysterically laughing hinata. She then snapped out of her thoughts and started a timer.

She then got to work on sakura ribs and belly. "Snrrk hehehehehehe hahahahahahahahahaha snrrk hahahahahahahahahahaha" As much as sakura tried, she couldn't surpress her laughter for more then a second. "You're allowed to laugh, you just have to keep going for as long as possible." Ino said. Once those words were out, sakura stopped holding back and laughed openly. As ino upped the torture, her laughter only grew. Ino knew her weak spots so she easily kept her laughing as she attacked her armpits and squeezed her hips. Sakura squirmed in her bonds, laughing herself to tears. "HAHAHAHA NOHOHOT YM ARMPIHIHIHITS HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA INHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" Sakura's mind was melting under her friend's assault"s

Eventually after 25 minutes, sakura finally begged for mercy. "25 minutes, nice work." Ino said, undoing sakura's bonds. Sakura rubbed herself, trying to erase the tingling sensations. She was glad the test was over though. Ino soon left, allowing sakura to lie on her bed, trying to catch her breath.

Only one thing passed through her mind as she lied there panting: Of all things to test us, SHE THINKS OF THIS!!!!???!??!?!?!?!
145221.title: Sakura's chunin training

14533222232.content: Next gen ninjas huh? Take your pick
14533222232.title: Boruto

145332222322.content:
Himawari snickered to herself as she snuck up on her older brother. Boruto was distracted by his new game and was determined to get to the final boss. Just as he was about to start to start the next level, Himawari pounced. "Haha tickle fight." Himawari announced before tickling her brother's belly. Boruto dropped his gaming and curled into a ball, laughing loudly. "Hahahaha hima stahahahap hahahahha" Boruto laughed out loud. "Haha ticklish big brother" She teased. "Oh haha yea" Boruto challenged before he broke free and tackled his sister. She fell back on the bed, laughing as he tickled her ribs. She curled up, laughing loudly, enjoying the playful tickling with her brother. He then attacked her belly as a bit of payback, She nearly exploded from laughing so hard. They both inherited naruto's tickle spots so there were more sensitive on their bellies and ribs.

She tried getting him back but was laughing to hard. She wildly swung her arms out, trying to find any spot she could find, eventually getting his armpits. Boruto clamped his arms together and fell back laughing harder. Himawari smiled as she got her brother laughing like a little kid. They haven't done anything like this since they were little. Both of them didn't say but they were having fun. Himawari burst out laughing as borut fought through his owl hysterics and got her armpits back. Hima fell on her back, laughing hysterically as her armpits were more sensitive. The room was fill of the siblings laughter as they tickled each other back and forth.

After a while they both stopped and just enjoyed a quiet moment. Hima decided to stay and watch boruto's game in action. Both of them unaware that their parents have been watching the whole time with gentle smiles.
145332222322.title: Himawari and boruto tickle fight

choices: Sakura wanted to be tickled again
14533222232321.content:
One day at the Uchiha household, minus saskue who was out on another mission, sarada decided to find out how her mother managed to enjoy being tickled. During their tickle fights she realized her mother seemed to enjoy it when she tickled her. Sarada ending up finding out she also kinda enjoyed being tickled as well. After a little story of how sakura and ino would have tickle fights and games as kids, sarada got a decent idea of where she got it from. As well as a playful smile. While sakura was walking away, sarada was sneaking up behind her and jammed her hands into her armpits.

Sakura, rather than double over lifted her arms behind her head, laughing loudly. Sarada saw for herself she wasn't seeing things. Her mom actually loved being tickled. Both of them smiled at each other and moved into sakura's bedroom. Sakura lied on the bed face down. She tucked her hands under her chin, keeping her armpits exposed. Sarada resumed tickling her armpits, making the pink-haired woman laugh out loud. Despite her weak spot being tortured, sakura did nothing to protect herself. She kicked her feet behind her, unable to help herself, all while she let her daughter drive her to near tears.

Sarada then switched to her ribs, gaining louder joyful laughter from her mother. Sarada watched in awe as she turned the strongest kunoichi(Probably?) into a laughing little girl. Tears starting leaking out of her eyes as she roared with laughter. She hasn't laughed this hard in ages and honestly, it felt really good. Plus she was hanging out with her kid so that was a nice bonus. Nearly 30 minutes later, sarada let her mother breathe. Sakura was both grateful and slightly disappointed that she did. She was having some trouble breathing from laughing so hard but she knew she could've taken more if she felt like it.

After getting her breath back, she looked back at her smiling daughter and-
14533222232321.title: Sakura's ticklish bliss

choices: Asked how she enjoyed being tickled
145332222323211.content:
Sakura was in a slice of heaven as sarada resumed tickling her mother. The woman was now face up, tucking her hands behind her head, offering her whole upper body to sarada's playful tickling. Her ribs, belly, sides, hips and armpits were all tickled without mercy. Sakura was laughing hysterically as her whole upper body was prodded by her kid. She had skill that only ino had. She couldn't remember the last time she laughed this hard but she wasn't complaining.

Sarada couldn't stop smiling as she drove her mother to near tears. It had been nearly an hour since she started yet she hasn't asked for a break. Sarada attacked her ribs and armpits the most since she learned they share the same spots. Sakura's laughter skyrocketed as those spots in particular. Tears began leaking out of her eyes as she roared with laughter. One hour has passed since sarada resumed tickling her and sakura was loving every second. The younger uchiha was feeling oddly conflicted. A part of her wanted to be tickled too but she was way more sensitive then her mother. Maybe...

Another 30 minutes pass before sakura finally begs for her to stop. As much as she was enjoying herself, she needed a break. "Man, that was fun. Huh Sarada what's wrong" sakura said concerned. Sarada was looking down blushing and stuttering. Finally she-
145332222323211.title: Sakura wanted to be tickled again

choices: Had a tickle contest for old times sake
145332222323213.content:
Minutes later, sakura's loud laughter was echoing from the yamanaka household as Ino was driving her old friend crazy with laughter. Sakura sat in front of her, keeping her hands on her head as ino tickled her whole upper body. Her fingers scribbled all over her, keeping the pink-haired woman hysterical with laughter. "You're just as ticklish as I remember sakura" Ino said, teasingly. Sakura knew she was just messing with her but she didn't care. She was having too much fun with her right now. Her fingers practically flew all over her, all she was able to do was laugh like a little girl, which was just what she wanted.

one hour later, ino stopped and let sakura breathe and wipe tears of mirth from her eyes. As a kid, she could barely handle 10 minutes, now she was able to take it for hours and would enjoy every second of it. After which she turned around and saw ino leaning back on her hands, giggling out of excitement. Despite being an adult, ino still loved being tickled. Sakura grinned and tickled her friend's belly, getting gut-busting laughter from the blonde. Ino threw her head back, laughing uncontrollably as her weak, but favorite spot was tickled by her friend. "Age hasn't changed you at all huh?" sakura thought, knowing she had no room to talk.

Ino laughed endlessly as sakura got her belly button. Ino was nearly crying with laughter but was loving every second. She remembered back when they were genin and even as kids in the academy, ino would let sakura tickle her belly and she would laugh her head off for hours. Another hour passes and sakura let ino breathe. Ino was disappointed she stopped. She could've taken another few hours with ease but not today.

After she caught her breath they
145332222323213.title: Sakura and Ino tickling

info.brief_description: Tickling everyone you could possibly think of!!!
info.description:
Welcome! Welcome! Welcome!

It's time yet again for Tickleton to unveil its next great attraction. The Dimension Room! Similar to most other portal based areas, in this lovely building, you get to pick a dimension to travel to. What do you do from there? Well being as we are in Tickleton, you find someone to tickle! Some are easier to obtain than others. And some might even get revenge!

Here in Tickleton's Dimension Room, we have a few rules.

1. The portals are for tickling, and sock/foot related activities only! Size change is only allowed if the character can normally size change.

2. No area of the body is off limits. Just be careful what you wish for!

3. No blood, gore, vore, or extreme violence allowed. Obviously some characters might get a tad agitated.

4. No toilet fetishes allowed. That includes pee, poo, and vomit.

5. Full on sex needs to be kept to a minimum.

6. Have fun!

Now then! Line on up and get to hunting! Those guys and gals aren't gonna tickle themselves....usually.
